text: Louis Giani (August 18, 1934 - January 19, 2021) was an American wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle featherweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. He was a member of the National Wrestling Hall of Fame. He was born in New York City. Giani died on January 19, 2021 in Huntington, New York at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American wrestlers Category:Olympians for the United States Category:Sportspeople from New York City
title: Louis Giani
